author: ashish
msg: Applied patch from jira issue OFBIZ-3344 - Adding Calendar event gives error in Accounting Manager.
5) Click on "Add new" for adding new event in calendar.
6) Give the event name on Add/modify a calendar event and then click on "Add" button

Thanks Divesh for the contribution and I totally agree that it is better to add single controller entry from workeffort instead of adding the whole controller at the top of accounting's controller.xml file.

author: ashish
msg: Applied patch from jira issue OFBIZ-3339 - Enhance Find Billing Account Screen to follow standard Find/List screen pattern.
Thanks Surya & Ratnesh for the contribution.

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2157: DelimitedPayloadTokenFilter no longer copies the buffer over itsself, instead it sets the length to the offset of the delimiter. Also optimizes logic and IdentityEncoder to use NIO.
